mapper.sql:
SELECT app.app_index, app_topic, app_fund, app_field, app_reference, app_phone, app_date, app.us_index, appro_index, appro_check, appro_note FROM application app INNER JOIN approval appro ON app.app_index = appro.app_index
app_topic LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
AND app_field LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
AND appro_check LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
mapper.delete: /* Application - approvalDelete */ DELETE FROM approval WHERE app_index = #{app_index}
/* Application - applicationDelete */ DELETE FROM application WHERE app_index = #{app_index}
mapper.insert: /* Application - applicationInsert */ INSERT INTO application (app_index, app_topic, app_fund, app_field, app_reference, app_phone, us_index) VALUES (application_seq.nextval, #{app_topic}, #{app_fund}, #{app_field}, #{app_reference}, #{app_phone}, #{us_index})
/* Application - approvalInsert */ INSERT INTO approval (appro_index, appro_check, app_index, us_index) VALUES (approval_seq.nextval, #{appro_check}, application_seq.currval, #{us_index})
mapper.select: /* Application - userProgressAppro */ SELECT list.* FROM (SELECT appro_index, appro_check, appro_note, app_index, us_index FROM approval WHERE us_index = #{us_index} ORDER BY appro_index DESC) list WHERE rownum BETWEEN 0 AND 1
